mapper.select: select column_seq, title, update_day, view_cnt from(select column_seq, title, update_day, view_cnt, rownum as rn from (select column_seq, title, update_day, view_cnt from columnboard order by column_seq desc)) where rn between 10*#i#-9 and 10*#i#
select column_seq , title,update_day,view_cnt,contents from columnboard where column_seq=#{column_seq}
mapper.update: update columnboard set view_cnt =(view_cnt+1) where column_seq=#{column_seq}
mapper.select: select column_seq , title,update_day,view_cnt,contents from columnboard order by column_seq desc
select column_seq from columnboard order by column_seq desc
select title from (select data.*, rownum as rn from (select title from columnboard order by column_seq desc) data) where rn between #{start} and #{start} + 4
select column_seq, title, view_cnt from columnboard where rownum between 1 and 10 order by view_cnt desc
